name: JavaScript Minesweeper
tagline: WebWorker powered Minesweeper game written in JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
body:
Minesweeper.js =========== A WebWorker powered Minesweeper game written in JavaScript, HTML and CSS. Features: ----------- + Configurable grid size (X, Y) + User can choose difficulty level + Configurable number of mines + Stopwatch with score keeping (LocalStorage) + Stack based grid traversal algorithm for memory efficiency + HTML5 web worker (if supported) will be used to perform the stack algorithm outside of the UI thread How to use: ----------- Download all the files and open `index.html` in a modern web browser.
